[[inst_hl_swp_u]]
==== HL.SWP.U

*Syntax:* hl.swp.u SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}>]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_swp_u.svg[HL.SWP.U encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PAIR
